name: WTB Resolute 650B Tire
description: The trail rubber experts at WTB designed the Resolute to be the all-weather, all-year choice for your dirt road and singletrack adventures. Perfect for gravel racing and off-road touring, their widely spaced square knobs provide consistent traction and quickly shed muck on wet days. This tread pattern also rolls well on smooth surfaces, so you won't suffer on the asphalt transitions between the backroads. Retro-ish tanwalls add a touch of style, and tubeless-ready design lets you enjoy the light weight, flat protection and low rolling resistance that comes with riding tubeless.Tubeless-ready.Well-spaced square knobs provide consistent traction and shed muck on muddy rides.Low rolling resistance.Retro tan sidewalls impart a classic look.Actual tire width may exceed 42mm depending on the rims used, so take note if your frame clearance is around 42mm.
